channel.title: No1 can see item... only me..... and add explosive pot?
channel.description:
I added models and ints and it worked.......but to prob... i got the item.. it works... i can see it....no 1 else can....
[hr]
how do i add a explosive pot and make it do 25dmg to u?

item.title: No1 can see item... only me..... and add explosive pot?
item.dc:creator: @drakeman drakeman
item.description:
@drakeman wrote:

where do i put the dropItem(####); gethurt(25); }

Read full topic
item.source: No1 can see item... only me..... and add explosive pot?

item.title: No1 can see item... only me..... and add explosive pot?
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

Ok, first off you must release the client your using. This way everyone has the same data as you. Next, for the potion there should be a dropping method, just make it so if you drop the explosive pot you get hit 25

so something like this:

dropItem(####);
gethurt(25);
}
thats only if you have the gethurt method, but this is just an example

Read full topic
